doctors.name: Sarah McKenna
doctors.location: London (London Bridge) | Online
doctors.title: Advanced Gastroenterology Dietitian
query: The patient has diagnosed endometriosis and has previously undergone surgery but continues to experience constant, unpredictable pelvic pain with flare-ups that are sometimes triggered by exercise. She reports reduced energy levels and would like support in understanding whether her pain may be related to pelvic floor tension, nerve sensitisation, muscular imbalance, or other factors. Her goal is to learn how to manage and reduce flare-ups, exercise safely without exacerbating symptoms, and improve overall quality of life, while avoiding further surgery. She is seeking a pelvic pain physiotherapist with specific experience in endometriosis and post-surgical pelvic pain management.
